docs.title: Welcome to ImagineRP
docs.text:
ImagineRP is a GTA RP Server that doesn't take things too seriously

Initial Development

August 2024

During this stage we worked to implement the basis and overall framework of the server.

Playtest 1

September 6th - 9th, 2024

This is where we will be testing the server with a small group of players to find bugs and gather feedback.

Development Phase 2

Starting: September 10th, 2024

During this phase we will be working to fix bugs discovered during the playtest, as well as working on new features.

Playtest 2

Approx: October 2024

In the second playtest we will once again be bug hunting and gathering feedback but with a larger group of players.

Development Phase 3

Approx: October 2024

We will once again go into development for the final time to fix bugs and finalise configuration etc for the server.

Applications Open

Approx: November 2024

Applications will open in Discord to join the server permanently. Aceptance will get you into the closed beta and full release. Playtesters will receive priority treatment.

Beta Release

Approx: November 2024

In the second playtest we will once again be bug hunting and gathering feedback but with a larger group of players.

Full Release

Approx: December 2024

In the second playtest we will once again be bug hunting and gathering feedback but with a larger group of players.

docs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
docs.text:
Is this server streamer friendly?

Yes, we work to ensure there's no explicit content in the server. If you spot any, please let us know.

The server may still contain copyrighted content - see copyrighted content

Is the server open to anyone?

The server is invite only during the testing phase

While we're relatively lenient about who we allow in, the server remains invite only. This may change at a later time.

Does this server have copyrighted music?

Loadscreen music is copyright free

Yes - GTA V contains copyrighted music in the game

You should turn down the radio volume and such in your GTA game settings if this is a concern for you.

docs.title: Disclaimer on Terminology
docs.text:
The ImagineRP team recognizes and acknowledges that certain terms used on this site such as "whitelist", "blacklist", and "master" are considered outdated and may be offensive to some due to their historical connotations. Unfortunately, these terms are still widely used in various software, including FiveM, and are the official terminology within the platform.

Avoiding Confusion

Essentially, we want to avoid causing any confusion for players, especially new players, that may be looking for "allowlist" when the word used by FiveM is "whitelist".

Our use of these terms is solely for consistency and clarity, ensuring that users can easily understand and follow instructions as they are presented in the software. We are committed to inclusivity and respect, and we want to make it clear that our use of these terms does not reflect any endorsement of the values they may be associated with.

Unfortunately, as these terms are integral to the software and cannot be altered by us, we aim to minimize confusion by maintaining consistency with the existing nomenclature. We appreciate your understanding and are always open to feedback on how we can better communicate and improve inclusivity.

docs.title: Installing
docs.text:
• Make sure you have installed and updated GTA V
  • Download FiveM from the website Run FiveM.exe. If you run the installer in an empty folder, FiveM will install there. Otherwise, it will install in %localappdata%\FiveM
  • Start FiveM from your Start menu

docs.title: Having trouble?
docs.text:
• Minimum Requirements

    Your PC will need to meet the minimum requirements set by GTA V & FiveM

    See Requirements

  • Client Issues Guide

    You'll need to apply for access to the server

    Client Issues Guide

docs.title: Minimum Requirements
docs.text:
PC Only

FiveM is not available to play on console

FiveM has similar minimum requirements to GTA V and requires that you have GTA V installed on your computer.

  • GTA V Installed

    You'll need to have a copy of GTA V already installed on your PC. If you don't already own GTA V you can purchase it from Steam, Epic, Rockstar, etc.

    It must be a legally owned copy, and you will need Rockstar Social account

  • FiveM Installed

    FiveM needs to be installed on your PC

    Install FiveM

  • Meet system requirements

    Your PC will need to meet the minimum requirements set by GTA V & FiveM

    See Requirements

  • Applied for entry

    You'll need to apply for access to the server

    TODO

docs.title: Chat Commands
docs.text:
Global Commands Proximity Chat Global Chat

Global Commands

Command Example Use Description /postal [postal code] /postal 420 Navigate to a postal code /bank /bank View your bank balance (top right corner) /cash /cash View your cash balance (top right corner) /taxi /taxi Call an AI taxi /taxi-other /taxi-other Call an AI taxi that is similar to Ridesharing like Uber or Lyft /limo /limo Call an AI limo

Proximity Chat

Proximity chat commands are visible only to nearby players

If a player is unable to see your chats, you should try using the Global Chat equivalent command instead Proximity chat is visible only to players within 20 meters of you.

Command Example Use Description /me [text] /me Hello World Normal chat as your character /do [text] /do Picks up keys Actions your character takes but can't display /leo [text] /leo Pull over Police-style chat (similar to /me but shows a police icon) /med [text] /med Are you injured? EMT-style chat (similar to /me but shows a medical icon) /ooc [text] /ooc Just FYI, I am livestreaming If you need to speak as yourself, out of your RP characterPlease limit use of OOC to maintain an RP environment

Global Chat

Global commands are broadcast to the entire server

Global chat commands and proximity chat commands, are identical with the exception that Global is visible to the entire server.

Command Example Use Description /gme [text] /gme Hello World Normal chat as your character /gdo [text] /gdo Picks up keys Actions your character takes but can't display /gleo [text] /gleo Pull over Police-style chat (similar to /gme but shows a police icon) /gmed [text] /gmed Are you injured? EMT-style chat (similar to /gme but shows a medical icon) /gooc [text] /gooc Just FYI, I am livestreaming If you need to speak as yourself, out of your RP characterPlease limit use of OOC to maintain an RP environment

docs.title: Default Keybinds
docs.text:
Your keybinds may differ

These keybinds are the default keybinds, and not necessarily what your keybinds may be set to.

Global Keybinds Scenario Specific Job Specific

Global Keybinds

  • On Foot

    Control Keybind Get Up after revival , Cancel emote X

  • Vehicles

    Control Keybind Seatbelt Ctrl+X Reset Airbags Alt+X Push Vehicle Ctrl+E at front or back of the car Get gas pump nozzle E Get EV Charger E

  • UI

    Control Keybind Targeting Left Alt Chat T Close license(s) Backspace Open Inventory (mini) Tab Open Inventory (full) F3 Quick Equip 1 2 3 4 5Quick equip the item in that position of your inventory

Scenario Specific

  • Robberies

    Control Keybind Start Robbery G Bail on robbery in progress X

Job Specific

  • Police

    Control Keybind Open MDT K Make MDT Transparent F4

docs.title: Targeting System
docs.text:
Use Left Alt to target certain things within the world and interact with them.

This is required for things like interacting with ATMs, Bank Desks, Houses, Car Catalogs, etc.

You will need to hold Left Alt and then walk near the interaction point.

Line up the and click then click on the option you want to carry out.

docs.title: Client Issues Guide
docs.text:
If you're experiencing difficulty playing on ImagineRP, first check and see if the issue persists with another FiveM server.

If the issue persists, it's likely the issue is with FiveM or your device. FiveM has support guides for a lot of common issues, and offers ticket-based support as well.

You can check out their troubleshooting guide here

docs.title: Known Issues
docs.text:
As a highly customized FiveM RP server, we certainly have our fair share of bugs to go along with it.

Anytime you come across a bug, please report it to us by using the /report commmand in the game.

These are the known issues we're currently aware of, and a workaround, if available.

General Issues

Bug Workaround Pressing E in the casino may trigger chat history No workaround known When spawning in, your spawn camera may start under the map. Wait for the animation to complete You may not have permission to use /logout command. Press F8 and type 'disconnect' Your microphone may become stuck always on Set a secondary keybind in the GTA V Settings for Voice Chat. Ammo at the weapon store is not intuitively named Try different ammo names for your weapons. Categories at the weapon store are incorrect, i.e. knife in handguns No workaround known

Economy

Bug Workaround The economy is not properly balanced "@Louipin" in discord.

Housing / Vehicle Related Issues

Bug Workaround Images in the housing screen and for apartments and home may not display No workaround known Speedometer UI may clip into the minimap. No workaround known Cars (mainly NPC) have a chance of de-spawning when damaged No workaround known Seatbelt icon when in a passenger in a car is hidden behind the minimap No workaround (but you can still see the icon at the beginning) Los Santos (LS) Customs not repairing vehicles No workaround known Some car dealerships on the map are missing MLOs and are not enterable. Go to a different dealer

Police Related Issues

Bug Workaround When using /jail or jailing via the MDT, the person will not be transported to the prison and get stuck Do not jail anyone, or if they do get stuck, use /unjail [id] Bank / cash register robberies will have an entry in the MDT, but no dispatch notification is triggered Check the MDT manually using /mdt CCTV Camera may be misplaced and do not show where the camera props are Cameras will still work, but props are missing Enabling your bodycam will cause your micrphone to be stuck on Set a secondary keybind for voice chat in Settings. Trigger points in Police Stations are improperly positioned Trigger points are present, but you may need to search the building for them. Animations do not play in Camera recordings during robberies No workaround known When issuing a charge via the MDT, it may be slow. Do not keep clicking as this will stack.
